LanguageData.RawPotatoes.label: Potatoes
LanguageData.RawPotatoes.description: Potatoes are a starchy, tuberous crop of a Potato Plant. They are not very tasty when eaten raw but they do grow quickly.
LanguageData.Rawbean.label: Bean Pod
LanguageData.Rawbean.description: Bean Pods are the edible seeds of the Bean Plant. They can be used for cooking or for making BioDiesel Fuel. Unpleasant when eaten raw.
LanguageData.RawTomatoes.label: Tomatoes
LanguageData.RawTomatoes.description: Tomatoes are round, palm sized, red, sharp-tasting fruits of the Tomato Vine. It is useful in cooking and is enjoyable to eat even when raw.
LanguageData.RawCarrots.label: Carrots
LanguageData.RawCarrots.description: Carrots are long, crunchy, orange root vegetables of the Carrot Plant. Refreshing when eaten raw.
LanguageData.Rawmushroom.label: Raw Champignon
LanguageData.Rawmushroom.description: Raw Champignon are small white or brown edible caps of the Champignon Mushroom. The caps are round in appearance. Unsavory when eaten raw, as the texture is similar to raw meat.
LanguageData.RawAlgae.label: Algae
